list.text:
Party Theme: Peppermint Stripes
The classic color combo still feels fresh thanks to cool blue accents. Touches of turquoise and teal get the red-and-white palette to pop.

Candy Wrappers
Simplify gift-wrapping with a single roll of white paper. It's elegant, economical and easy to customize with tree cuttings, ribbon and drug store candy.

Sugar Rush
All you need for a festive garland are cellophane-wrapped mints and clear tape. Hang crimps of ribbon candy by ribbon loops, and get the tutorials for matching rosette and cookie-cutter ornaments.

Sweet Treats
Rethink the candy dish by filling a tray with candles and peppermint puffs. It's a coffee table display that's part decoration, part dessert.
